description:
Roulette.fallback() (shared/time_manipulation/roulette/roulette_3round.sol#8-18) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (shared/time_manipulation/roulette/roulette_3round.sol#16)

Roulette.fallback() (shared/time_manipulation/roulette/roulette_3round.sol#8-18) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number % 15 == 0 (shared/time_manipulation/roulette/roulette_3round.sol#15)
